title: 5.3 Master Challenge 3
question: The number of matches played by ten teams, along with the number of matches won and lost, are added to an Excel worksheet. Visualize the results using Sparklines. Refer to the following data and prepare a similar worksheet. Plot the data using the Win/ Loss Sparklines.

testcases.value:

input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11
